sections.summary: to obtain a position with a company that offers the chance for me to utilize my call center and customer service skills to the best of my ability. as well as an opportunity for advancement and a competitive salary. i am a highly personable call center representative with experience in customer service, collections, and call center operations. accomplishments reached monthly sales goals on several occasions.
